name: Sample Notification Web Server Application
description: Sample web application to receive Twilio Notify notification.

MASTER_ACCOUNT_SID.description: Your Twilio account SID. You view it here: https://console.twilio.com

MASTER_API_KEY.description: API Keys are revokable credentials for the Twilio API. You can view it here: https://www.twilio.com/console/project/api-keys

MASTER_API_KEY_SECRET.description: API Keys are revokable credentials for the Twilio API. Only when the API key is created, is the API key secret visible.
